title: #分享 中國樂團 INCHAOS (Metalcore / Djent)
content:
繼Life Awaits後又一組來自中國的新秀 INCHAOS
一男一女雙主唱的搭配還不錯～


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pp9Q3tYBkKI 


---
我們的世界開始陷落

This is a fate that we dont know we love or hate
There's a time when we live and die in vain
This is story end This is story end
Look into my eyes
You'll see how it ends

Give up, but don’t give in!

我割破了銀河 掌心生出脈絡
清晰不通的夢在眉頭 將我緊鎖
Let go of who I was
撕裂星空掙脫 種下彼岸花朵
平行時空交錯 也沒你我

我們的世界開始陷落
This is a fate that we don't know we love or hate
There's a time when we live and die in vain
This is story end this is story end
Look into my eyes
You'll see how it ends

你說過的一切
將我毀滅
在時間的房間
清算誓言

This is a fate that we don't know we love or hate
There's a time when we live and die in vain
(We die in vain)

This is the last chance!
Give up, but don’t give in

我割破了銀河 掌心生出脈絡
清晰不通的夢在眉頭 將我緊鎖
撕裂星空掙脫 種下彼岸花朵
平行時空交錯 也沒你我
---

延伸聆聽  
Life Awaits - Better Now

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zsLggvLVu08
excerpt: 繼Life Awaits後又一組來自中國的新秀 INCHAOS，一男一女雙主唱的搭配還不錯～---，我們的世界開始陷落，This is a fate that we dont know we love
